scripts.export: slidev export ./01_git.md --format pdf --output ./pdfs/01_git.pdf --dark && slidev export ./02_js.md --format pdf --output ./pdfs/02_js.pdf --dark --with-clicks && slidev export ./03_node_vite.md --format pdf --output ./pdfs/03_node_vite.pdf --dark --with-clicks && slidev export ./04_openlayers.md --format pdf --output ./pdfs/04_openlayers.pdf --dark --with-clicks
scripts.export-handout: slidev export ./01_git.md --format pdf --output ./pdfs/01_git_handout.pdf --dark --theme ./theme-handout && slidev export ./02_js.md --format pdf --output ./pdfs/02_js_handout.pdf --dark --theme ./theme-handout --with-clicks && slidev export ./03_node_vite.md --format pdf --output ./pdfs/03_node_vite_handout.pdf --dark --theme ./theme-handout --with-clicks && slidev export ./04_openlayers.md --format pdf --output ./pdfs/04_openlayers_handout.pdf --dark --theme ./theme-handout --with-clicks
